svg.text: Professional Peace Forces Under Indigenous Guidance and Democratic Accountability
All deployments require Earth Council consultation and Traditional Territory consent
UNSC override or Global Citizens' Initiative provides legal mandate for all operations
Cultural competency, human rights training, and Traditional Knowledge integration required
Operations prioritize community healing, restoration, and long-term relationship building
From Military Intervention to Regenerative Protection
The Global Enforcement Mechanism replaces failed ad-hoc military coalitions with professional
protection forces guided by Indigenous wisdom, funded through Treaty taxation, and accountable
to affected communities through comprehensive democratic oversight and traditional governance integration.
Funding: Treaty Global Taxation (Carbon Tax + Financial Transaction Tax)
Sustainable, independent funding enabling rapid deployment without donor dependency
